abstract: E.On, the world’s largest utility by sales, has shortlisted three bidders for the multi-billion euro sale of its U.S. business, Reuters reported.
snippet: E.On, the world’s largest utility by sales, has shortlisted three bidders for the multi-billion euro sale of its U.S. business, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Germany’s E.On, the world’s largest utility by sales, has shortlisted three bidders for the multibillion-euro sale of its United States business, Reuters reported, citing three people with knowledge of the matter.

headline.main: E.On Said to Shortlist 3 Bidders For U.S. Business
